testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to create a new announcement record via API connection
testcase.name: It must be verified via the API that the announcement record that you want to update via the API
testcase.system-out: Given The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.................passed When The api user prepares a GET request containing the 397 information to send to the api getNoticeById endpoint..passed Then The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the "lists.title" information in the response body is "mama"..passed
